articles.title: Vicky Jain channels his mother, reminds Ankita of the 'freedom' he has given her - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Bigg Boss 17: A new promo for an upcoming episode shows Vicky Jain and Ankita Lokhande at loggerheads again.
articles.content: On one of the early episodes of the currently-on-air Bigg Boss 17, contestant Vicky Jain's mom spoke about all the chooth (freedom) that he has allowed his wife, co-contestant Ankita Lokhande. Fans o… [+2075 chars]
